item.title: Wholesale Distributor Customer Segmentation Analysis to Optimize the Delivery Service & Strategies
item.description: Overview In this project, i analyzed a dataset containing data on various customers’ annual spending amounts across diverse product categories. The goal is to identify distinct customer segments and derive insights to inform business strategies, particularly in optimizing delivery services. Data Analysis and Preprocessing Explored the dataset to understand customer spending behavior and preferences. Box-Cox Transformed Outlier Removal Employed techniques like Principal Component Analysis (PCA) to reduce dimensionality and uncover underlying structures.
